Steps.StepString: We visited a website with the possibility to upload two PDF files.
We noted the challenge description which stated that the two invitations sent had the same MD5 hash but were slightly different.
We used a Python script to generate two PDF with the same MD5 hash.
We uploaded the two biological PDFs.
The website redirected to the source code.
We located the flag in a comment at the end of the code, at line 37.
